title: Roast red mullet fillet with Charlotte potatoes, fennel, olives and capers
description: This is a great way to cook red mullet because the fat from the fish melts into the potatoes and makes them taste delicious, as well as giving them a lovely colour and crisp texture.
ingredients: 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
2 whole red mullets, scaled and filleted
2 heaped tbsp pitted black olives, preferably taggiasca
200g/7oz datterini or cherry tomatoes, cut in half
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
extra virgin olive oil, to serve
